description.ko: 금속성 빗방울마다 반사되는, 잠들지 않는 도시의 짜릿한 심장박동.
description.en: The electric heartbeat of a city that never sleeps, reflected in every drop of metallic rain.

prompt: Unreal Engine 5, Octane Render, 8k. An ultra-detailed close-up of a futuristic skyscraper's facade during a torrential downpour. Neon pink and cyan fiber-optic cables glowing behind wet glass panels. Hyper-realistic rain reflections and futuristic urban textures with volumetric fog. Cinematic lighting highlighting the intricate circuit-like architecture of a digital metropolis.
